item.title: The US Election 2016
item.description:
The US Election 2016

The possibility of Donald Trump being President of the United States after the US election would mean that for the first time in history (I think), the Commander-in-Chief of the US military would not have the respect of their senior military and intelligence staff. Which raises the question, could there be a military coup in North America? Well as crazy as that sounds if Mr Trump is a hands on President it's not totally out of the question. Mr Trump isn’t known for his calm temperament or empathy for others and he certainly doesn’t forgive. All things that I think make a good leader. It's one thing to fire someone from a boardroom table but another thing all together to order people be fired at.

item.title: Home for Christmas
item.description:
Home for Christmas

Well, I sleep, watch tv and sometimes render 3D models like this one.

item.title: We are here.
item.description:
We are here.

I love this painting. The atmosphere and the girl's lack of fear as the strangers emerge makes the piece rather tense. Check out his place on Deviant Art

item.title: Husband writes defiant tribute to his wife killed in Bataclan massacre
item.description:
Husband writes defiant tribute to his wife killed in Bataclan massacre

I will not give you the gift of hating you. You have obviously sought it but responding to hatred with anger would be to give in to the same ignorance that that has made you what you are.
